text: Ye byakti ratera bibhinna prahare [1] sajâ€Œdabanata haye o damriye anugatya prakasa kare, akhiratake bhaya kare [2] ebam tara rabera anugraha pratyasa kare, (se ki tara samana, ye ta kare na?) Baluna, 'yara jane ebam yara jane na, tara ki samana?' Bodhasakti sampanna lokera'i sudhu upadesa grahana kare
